casebody.data:
Esther PINE, Appellant, v. COLUMBIAN NATIONAL LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellee. No. 457. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 27, 1933. Irving Lemov, of Jamaica, L. I., N. Y., for appellant. Platt, Taylor & Walker, of New York City (Eli J. Blair, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

*1021Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
